api_list.name: Get home anoauncement
api_list.description: This I s getttin home announcements
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-and-jobs.p.rapidapi.com/homes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-and-jobs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
